port.port_name: Bridge of the Americas Port of Entry

port.construction_notice: Ready Lane is now operational at Gateway Bridge - Lane 1. Tune in to AM 1610 for border crossing information.

Ready Lane is open from 6AM until MIDNIGHT seven days a week. Ready Lane is on the far left as you approach.

Ready Lanes are open at PDN. See www.getyouhome.gov for more information. Tune in to AM 1620 for border crossing information.

CARGO Monday-Friday 8 am to 4 pm. Saturday/Sunday Closed.
